title-group.article-title: Corrigendum: Soluble PD−L1 changes in advanced non-small cell lung cancer patients treated with PD-1 inhibitors: an individual patient data meta-analysis

article-meta.related-article: A Corrigendum on Soluble PD-L1 changes in advanced non-small cell lung cancer patients treated with PD-1 inhibitors: an individual patient data meta-analysis by Shimizu T, Inoue E, Ohkuma R, Kobayashi S, Tsunoda T and Wada S (2023) Front. Immunol. 14:1308381. doi: 10.3389/fimmu.2023.1308381

body.p: In the published article, there was an error in the legend for Figure 2 and Figure 3 as published. Figure 2B and Figure 3B ; Hazard ratios of overall death, and Figure 3 legend; B; disease progression. The corrected legend appears below.

caption.p: Forest plots representing hazard ratios of death (A; overall death, B; disease progression) for sPD-L1 fold changes in each trial.
Forest plots representing hazard ratios of death (A; overall death, B; disease progression) for sPD-L1 changes by subgroup.

body.p: Figure 2B and Figure 3B ; Hazard ratios of disease progression, and Figure 3 legend; B; disease progression.
The authors apologize for these errors and state that this does not change the scientific conclusions of the article in any way. The original article has been updated.
